parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a custom radio channel with the given color, label, call sign and registered characters. The '''[[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]]''' returned can be used to manipulate the created channel later. There are 10 slots for custom radio channels which would correspond to channels 6-15 (see [[getPlayerChannel]]). The command will find an unused index in this range and create it when found.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[radioChannelCreate]] [color, label, callSign, units, sentenceType]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - RGBA color values

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> label: [[String]] - label

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> callSign: [[String]] - call sign

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> units: [[Array]] - list of units in the channel

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sentenceType (Optional): [[Boolean]] (Default: [[true]]) 
* [[true]] - use ''Protocol'' message color from <tt>[[getArray]] ([[configFile]] >> "RscChatListDefault" >> "colorMessageProtocol")</tt>
* [[false]] - use ''Normal'' message color from <tt>[[getArray]] ([[configFile]] >> "RscChatListDefault" >> "colorMessage")</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - created '''[[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]]''' (used in [[customChat]] command), 0 if failed

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_channelID= [[radioChannelCreate]] [[0.96, 0.34, 0.13, 0.8], "Q-dance Radio", "%UNIT_NAME", [player1, player2]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_channelID = [[radioChannelCreate]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[0.96, 0.34, 0.13, 0.8], "Q-dance Radio", "%UNIT_NAME", [player1, player2],</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[true]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>];</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>using [[true]] also disables automatic quotes for chat in channel (<template><title>arma3</title></template>)</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Create custom channel and add all players to it, present and JIP:<code>[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]]
{
	[[private]] _channelName = "Q-dance Radio";
	[[private]] _channelID = [[radioChannelCreate]] [[0.96, 0.34, 0.13, 0.8], _channelName, "%UNIT_NAME", []];
	[[if]] (_channelID == 0) [[exitWith]] {[[diag_log]] [[format]] ["Custom channel '%1' creation failed!", _channelName]};
	[_channelID, {_this [[radioChannelAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]]]}] [[remoteExec]] ["call", [0, -2] [[select]] [[isDedicated]], _channelName];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[radioChannelAdd]], [[radioChannelRemove]], [[radioChannelSetCallSign]], [[radioChannelSetLabel]], [[customChat]], [[customRadio]], [[setCurrentChannel]], [[currentChannel]], [[enableChannel]], [[channelEnabled]], [[getPlayerChannel]]
</value></part></template>
